venue.name: Alternatives Unlimited, Inc. & Whitin Mill Complex Singh Performance Center

item.description:
Opening Night wine-n-cheese reception and the play, "Tuesdays With Morrie". 

Address: Alternatives Unlimited, Inc. at 50 Douglas Road, Whitinsville, MA 01588 on Friday, March 2; Reception and Art Gallery from  5:00 PM - 7:45 PM in the Aldrich Heritage Gallery; "TUESDAYS WITH MORRIE" in the adjacent Singh Performance Center at 8 PM. Cost: $15.00 per person, or $12.00 for groups of 10 or more.

Please reserve your seat under “Diane’s Group” by calling or emailing the theater directly. Reserve at: 508-296-0797, or email: pilgrimsoulproductions@gmail.com. Should your plans change, or if you need to cancel, please notify the theater. S

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside at the wine and cheese reception
item.name: Theater, Wine/Cheese, and Art: Reserve directly with theater as Diane's Group
